_sText:
Map Changes:
============
- More realistic/suitable lighting.
- Ladders added inside the vents. 
- Changed some of the weapons that are found in-game. 
- Removed the skylight and moved the teleport exit appropriately. 
- Rearranged and added more furniture/vehicles into the basement parking lot.
- Replaced the boxes placed around the level with contaminated barrels.

Join our Steam group and play with us in our 50 slot ZombieHunt server:
[http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ParanormalContainmentProject](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ParanormalContainmentProject "Official ||pCp|| Steam Group")
